text: The Bay Boy is a 1984 Canadian coming of age biographical drama movie directed by Daniel Petrie and starring Kiefer Sutherland, Liv Ullmann, Peter Donat, Alan Scarfe, Chris Wiggins, Mathieu Carri√®re, Thomas Peacocke and Isabelle Mejias. It was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 drama movies Category:1980s coming-of-age movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:Canadian biographical movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Daniel Petrie Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies set in Nova Scotia
title: The Bay Boy
